title: Public transport for Round 3 of the 2023 AFL season
articleContent:
Public transport for Round 3 of the 2023 AFL season

Public transport is the best way to get to the game during Round 3 of the 2023 AFL season!

Extra services will run to and from the MCG and Marvel Stadium.

Plan your trip to the game using Journey planner.

Round 3 matches

Western Bulldogs v Brisbane, Marvel Stadium - Thursday 30 March at 7.20pm

Collingwood v Richmond, MCG - Friday 31 March at 7.50pm

St Kilda v Essendon, MCG - Saturday 1 April at 7.25pm

Melbourne v Sydney, MCG - Sunday 2 April at 3.20pm

Before you travel

We strongly encourage you to register your myki. With a registered myki you can protect your myki balance if the card is lost or stolen, check your travel history and manage multiple myki cards in the one account.

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.
articleDescription: Extra public transport services for Round 3 of the 2023 AFL season
